description: Nihal Garisa (ngarisa) This app utilizes the Pokemon API. I can create a list of pokemon as I enter them into the form and remove them all if I want to. https://pokeapi.co/docs/v2 (link to the docs) YouTube Demo Video - https://youtu.be/ViG_xTh1_Ec?si=JKUjImM88WvjGBKP
